TITLE: Edit your videos online
META: Easiest way to edit your videos online
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our video editing process elegant and straightforward
The results are accurate and hence completely satisfy user needs
You can use this application from now on any operating system, like Windows/Mac/Linux/Android/iPhone.
There is no server involved and hence your video is safe
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
The application works completely on your browser without invlolving any server.Hence your data is safe

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to edit your video
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets loaded
Choose appropriate settings in the workspace
Click save to download your video

FAQ.question: How much time does it takes to edit my video?
FAQ.answer: Once you click on save,it will take a bit of time if there is need for video re-encoding or immediately gives result, it is based on your video size

FAQ.question: Can I rely on this application to get my job done?
FAQ.answer: Yes Ofcourse! Our application never fails to impress you by getting your job done in no time

FAQ.question: What will happen if I refresh the browser?
FAQ.answer: As we give first priority to your data security, they are not uploaded to server. So refreshing resets your settings and video file

FAQ.question: Are the test results accurate and correct?
FAQ.answer: Your test result is 100% accurate and precisely calculated

FAQ.question: Why is my video taking lot of time to edit?
FAQ.answer: Your video maybe of very large size. As we dont use servers,large video files take a bit of extra time to process

acceptedAnswer.text:
Most unopened items in new condition and returned within 90 days will receive a refund or exchange. Some items have a modified return policy noted on the receipt or packing slip. Items that are opened or damaged or do not have a receipt may be denied a refund or exchange. Items purchased online or in-store may be returned to any store.

Online purchases may be returned via a major parcel carrier. Click here to initiate a return.

mainEntity.name: How long does it take to process a refund?

acceptedAnswer.text: We will reimburse you for returned items in the same way you paid for them. For example, any amounts deducted from a gift card will be credited back to a gift card. For returns by mail, once we receive your return, we will process it within 4â€“5 business days. It may take up to 7 days after we process the return to reflect in your account, depending on your financial institution's processing time.

mainEntity.name: What is the policy for late/non-delivery of items ordered online?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Our local teams work diligently to make sure that your order arrives on time, within our normaldelivery hours of 9AM to 8PM in the recipient's time zone. During busy holiday periods like Christmas, Valentine's and Mother's Day, we may extend our delivery hours before 9AM and after 8PM to ensure that all gifts are delivered on time. If for any reason your gift does not arrive on time, our dedicated Customer Service agents will do everything they can to help successfully resolve your issue.

Click here to complete the form with your order-related question(s).

mainEntity.name: When will my credit card be charged?

acceptedAnswer.text: We'll attempt to securely charge your credit card at the point of purchase online. If there's a problem, you'll be notified on the spot and prompted to use another card. Once we receive verification of sufficient funds, your payment will be completed and transferred securely to us. Your account will be charged in 24 to 48 hours.

mainEntity.name: Will I be charged sales tax for online orders?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Local and State sales tax will be collected if your recipient's mailing address is in:
  • Arizona
  • California
  • Colorado

StructuredDataHowTo.name: How to set alarm for 1 minutes:

step.text: Click submit to set alarm, that's it !.
